name: Xaero's World Map Data File
summary: An XAERO file contains map data for Xaero's World Map, a popular Minecraft mod that adds a detailed minimap and world map to the game. It stores information about a map, including the areas of the Minecraft world the player has explored. XAERO files correspond to specific regions or chunks of the world, capturing terrain details and visual data, such as terrain layout, biome types, and structures, that appear in the mod's map interface.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Mojang Minecraft with Xaero's World Map installed
